name: Harvest Island (Civan, egeisbarali)
description: Harvest Island A game maked in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52 game jam. If web version doesn't work for you, try download the game. Make your harvest island! WARNING: If you playing in the browser, make sure to play in fullscreen! (Press F11 in game page.) Controls Left Click - Grid Interaction A, D - Horizontal Camera Control W, S - Vertical Camera Control Mouse Wheel - Camera Zoom Control Used Assets Sound Effects - Epidemic Music - Pixabay Water Shader - Unity Asset StoreDevelopersCivan - Game Developer, 3D ArtistEge - Game Developer, 3D Artist
